      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
                   throws org.keyple.seproxy.exceptions.IOReaderException
        Set a list of parameters on a reader.

        See setParameter(String, String) for more details

        Specified by:
        setParameters in interface org.keyple.seproxy.ConfigurableReader
        Parameters:
        parameters - the new parameters
        Throws:
        org.keyple.seproxy.exceptions.IOReaderException - This method can fail when disabling the exclusive mode as it's executed instantly

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String value)
                  throws org.keyple.seproxy.exceptions.IOReaderException
        Set a parameter.

        These are the parameters you can use with their associated values:

        • protocol:
          • Tx: Automatic negotiation (default)
          • T0: T0 protocol
          • T1: T1 protocol
        • mode:
          • shared: Shared between apps and threads (default)
          • exclusive: Exclusive to this app and the current thread
        • disconnect:
          • reset: Reset the card
          • unpower: Simply unpower it
          • leave: Unsupported
          • eject: Eject
        • thread_wait_timeout: Number of milliseconds to wait
        Specified by:
        setParameter in interface org.keyple.seproxy.ConfigurableReader
        Parameters:
        name - Parameter name
        value - Parameter value
        Throws:
        org.keyple.seproxy.exceptions.IOReaderException - This method can fail when disabling the exclusive mode as it's executed instantly
